query:
-- Renumber all tabs in one go using CASE
UPDATE tabs_content 
SET tabNumber = CASE tabNumber
  WHEN 0 THEN 1
  WHEN 1 THEN 10
  WHEN 2 THEN 20
  WHEN 3 THEN 30
  WHEN 4 THEN 40
  WHEN 5 THEN 50
  WHEN 6 THEN 60
  WHEN 7 THEN 70
  WHEN 8 THEN 80
  WHEN 9 THEN 90
  WHEN 10 THEN 100
  WHEN 11 THEN 2
  ELSE tabNumber
END;

SELECT documentId, tabNumber, tabTitle FROM tabs_content WHERE documentId = 1 ORDER BY tabNumber;
